Index >  CapMaxValue

CapMaxValue

Description

Returns the maximum value of a capability.

Data type

<double>

Syntax

.CapMaxValue;

Remarks

Check this property after calling CapGet().

Valid only when the capability has the CapType of TWON_RANGE (6).

Default value reflects the Data Source's power-on value. It can NOT be set.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode orErrorStringfor error information.

See also

How to Negotiate Capability with Different Capability Container Types

CapGet()
CapReset()
CapSet()
